spring-crops-bundle.proTip: This is your FIRST bundle to complete. Plant all 4 crops on Day 1 of Spring Year 1. Use Basic Fertilizer on every tile - you need GOLD quality. Cauliflower is the bottleneck at 12 days growth.
spring-crops-bundle.strategyNote: Priority order: Cauliflower (plant by Spring 16), then Potato, Green Bean, Parsnip. If you miss gold quality, don't stress - you have Spring Year 2. The 20 Speed-Gro reward is excellent for Summer crops.
spring-crops-bundle.yearOneStrategy: 100% achievable Year 1 Spring. Buy seeds Day 1, use fertilizer, water daily. Farming Level 0 can still get gold quality with Basic Fertilizer.
spring-crops-bundle.commonMistake: Forgetting fertilizer! Without it, gold quality is RNG-dependent. Basic Fertilizer from Sap is free.
spring-crops-bundle.rewardValue: 20 Speed-Gro saves 2000g and speeds up Summer crops significantly. Use on Melons or Starfruit.
spring-crops-bundle.alternativeSource: Traveling Cart sometimes sells gold quality crops - check every Friday/Sunday.

summer-crops-bundle.proTip: Melon is the 12-day bottleneck. Plant by Summer 16 at latest. Hot Peppers regrow - plant early and harvest multiple times for gold quality chances.
summer-crops-bundle.strategyNote: Blueberries are the easiest - they regrow and give 3 berries per harvest. Multiple chances for gold. Tomatoes also regrow. Focus fertilizer on Melon.
summer-crops-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Easy Year 1. Hot Pepper and Blueberry regrow, giving multiple gold quality attempts. Melon needs fertilizer priority.
summer-crops-bundle.commonMistake: Planting Melon too late. Summer 17+ means no harvest before Fall. Also forgetting that Hot Peppers need 5 days initial + 3 day regrow.
summer-crops-bundle.rewardValue: 20 Quality Fertilizer is huge! That's 2000g saved. Use on Fall Pumpkins for the Quality Crops Bundle.
summer-crops-bundle.alternativeSource: Hot Peppers from Traveling Cart are rare but possible. Oasis sells Melon seeds if Pierre runs out.

fall-crops-bundle.proTip: CORN CAN BE PLANTED IN SUMMER! Start Corn on Summer 1 for Fall gold quality harvest. This spreads your workload and corn regrows.
fall-crops-bundle.strategyNote: Pumpkin is 13 days - must plant by Fall 15. Yam and Eggplant are both 10 days. Corn planted in Summer continues into Fall.
fall-crops-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Plant Corn Summer 1, it survives season change. Fall: prioritize Pumpkin (longest growth). Bee House reward unlocks passive honey income.
fall-crops-bundle.commonMistake: Missing the Pumpkin deadline. Fall 16+ planting = no harvest. Also forgetting Corn can start in Summer.
fall-crops-bundle.rewardValue: Bee House produces honey worth 100-680g depending on nearby flowers. Fairy Rose honey is 680g! Place near flower patches.
fall-crops-bundle.alternativeSource: Traveling Cart occasionally has fall crops. Corn especially common since it's also Summer.

quality-crops-bundle.proTip: You only need 3 of 4 crop types. Skip the hardest one for your situation. Most players skip Corn (need 5 gold from same harvest is tough) or Melon.
quality-crops-bundle.strategyNote: This bundle needs 5 GOLD of each type, not just 1. Requires serious fertilizer investment. Deluxe Speed-Gro + Quality Fertilizer combo is ideal but expensive.
quality-crops-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Achievable Year 1 with planning. Parsnip: plant 15+ with fertilizer Spring. Pumpkin: plant 15+ Fall 1. Pick two of Melon/Corn based on your luck.
quality-crops-bundle.commonMistake: Underestimating the 5 gold requirement. You need to plant significantly more than 5 of each crop. Expect 30-50% gold rate with fertilizer.
quality-crops-bundle.rewardValue: Preserves Jar is ESSENTIAL for profit. Turns 50g Blueberry into 150g jelly. Every farmer needs multiple Preserves Jars.
quality-crops-bundle.alternativeSource: NO alternative - you must grow these yourself. Quality crops cannot be purchased anywhere.

animal-bundle.proTip: Build Coop first (Year 1 Spring), then Barn. Large eggs from happy chickens, Large milk from happy cows. Friendship = quality. Pet and talk to animals DAILY.
animal-bundle.strategyNote: Wool needs Sheep (Deluxe Barn) or Rabbit (Deluxe Coop). Duck eggs need Ducks (Big Coop). Plan your building upgrades early.
animal-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Coop Spring, Big Coop Summer (for Ducks), Barn Fall, Big Barn Winter. Deluxe Barn for Sheep by Year 2 Spring for Wool.
animal-bundle.commonMistake: Neglecting animal friendship. Low hearts = no large products. Also: Wool requires Deluxe-tier buildings which many players delay.
animal-bundle.rewardValue: Cheese Press turns 500g Large Milk into 345g Cheese (or 483g gold). Not the best ROI but needed for recipes and gifts.
animal-bundle.alternativeSource: Large Eggs/Milk from Traveling Cart occasionally. Duck Eggs rare but possible. Wool almost never appears.

artisan-bundle.proTip: GET A PIG ASAP. Truffle Oil is the hardest item - needs Pig (Deluxe Barn, 16000g animal). Start barn upgrades early Year 1.
artisan-bundle.strategyNote: Apple/Pomegranate need fruit trees (28 days to mature). Plant Spring 1 Year 1 for Fall harvest. Jelly/Pickles are easy filler.
artisan-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Tight but possible. Fruit trees Spring 1, Barn upgrades through year, Pig by Fall/Winter. Oil Maker from Farming 8. Truffle hunting in Year 2 Spring.
artisan-bundle.commonMistake: Not planting fruit trees early enough. 28 days = plant by Spring 1 for Fall fruit. Also underestimating Pig cost (16000g + Deluxe Barn).
artisan-bundle.rewardValue: KEG is the BEST reward in the game! Turns 50g Wheat into 200g Beer, 750g Starfruit into 2250g Wine. Game-changing for profit.
artisan-bundle.alternativeSource: Traveling Cart: Truffle Oil occasionally appears (expensive but saves a season). Fruit tree products never appear.

river-fish-bundle.proTip: Catfish is RAIN ONLY. Check weather forecast night before - if rain tomorrow, prioritize fishing. Shad is Fall-only, plan ahead.
river-fish-bundle.strategyNote: Sunfish (Spring/Summer day), Catfish (rain only), Shad (Fall only), Tiger Trout (Fall/Winter). Spread across seasons.
river-fish-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Spring: Sunfish easy. Summer: pray for rain for Catfish. Fall: Shad + Tiger Trout. If no Summer rain, wait for Fall rain for Catfish.
river-fish-bundle.commonMistake: Ignoring weather. Catfish ONLY spawns in rain. Also forgetting Shad is Fall-exclusive - miss it and wait a whole year.
river-fish-bundle.rewardValue: 30 Bait saves 150g and early fishing time. Not huge but helpful for more Catfish attempts.
river-fish-bundle.alternativeSource: Catfish from Traveling Cart is your BEST backup. Check every Friday/Sunday if you missed rainy days.

lake-fish-bundle.proTip: Sturgeon is Summer/Winter Mountain Lake, 6am-7pm. One of the harder bundle fish at 78 difficulty. Use Cork Bobber and +Fishing food.
lake-fish-bundle.strategyNote: Largemouth Bass (all seasons), Carp (all seasons/easy), Bullhead (all seasons), Sturgeon (Summer/Winter, hard). Sturgeon is the bottleneck.
lake-fish-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Get easy fish (Carp, Bullhead, Bass) whenever. Save Sturgeon for Winter when you have better fishing skill and tackle.
lake-fish-bundle.commonMistake: Attempting Sturgeon at low Fishing level. Wait until Level 6+ with Cork Bobber. Use Dish o' The Sea food buff.
lake-fish-bundle.rewardValue: Dressed Spinner is a solid tackle - increases bite rate by 25%. Good for grinding fishing XP or specific rare fish.
lake-fish-bundle.alternativeSource: Sturgeon appears on Traveling Cart occasionally. Expensive but saves frustration if fishing isn't your thing.

ocean-fish-bundle.proTip: Pufferfish is the HARDEST. Summer ONLY, 12pm-4pm ONLY, SUNNY only. That's a 4-hour window on sunny Summer days. Plan dedicated trips.
ocean-fish-bundle.strategyNote: Sardine (all seasons, easy), Tuna (Summer/Winter), Red Snapper (Summer/Fall, rain), Tilapia (Summer/Fall), Pufferfish (Summer, sun, 12-4pm).
ocean-fish-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Pufferfish is do-or-die in Summer Year 1. Check forecast for sunny days, be at ocean by 12pm. Other fish are flexible.
ocean-fish-bundle.commonMistake: Missing Pufferfish window. If you don't get it Summer Year 1, you wait an ENTIRE YEAR. It's 80 difficulty too.
ocean-fish-bundle.rewardValue: 5 Warp Totem: Beach saves tons of time. Each totem worth 200g+ in time savings. Great for shell collecting and fishing.
ocean-fish-bundle.alternativeSource: Pufferfish on Traveling Cart is EXTREMELY rare but possible. Your best backup if Summer ends.

night-fishing-bundle.proTip: All these fish spawn 12am-2am window. Walleye needs RAIN + Fall. Bream is easy filler. Eel is Spring/Fall.
night-fishing-bundle.strategyNote: Walleye (Fall, rain, night), Bream (all seasons, night, easy), Eel (Spring/Fall, night). Check weather for Fall rain nights.
night-fishing-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Bream whenever you fish at night. Eel in Spring or Fall nights. Walleye requires Fall + Rain + Night - limited windows.
night-fishing-bundle.commonMistake: Forgetting Walleye's triple requirement: Fall + Rain + Night. Miss all Fall rainy nights and you wait a year.
night-fishing-bundle.rewardValue: Small Glow Ring lights up 5 tiles around you. Helpful for night fishing and mine navigation. Stacks with other rings.
night-fishing-bundle.alternativeSource: Walleye occasionally on Traveling Cart. Eel too. Bream too easy to need alternatives.

specialty-fish-bundle.proTip: SANDFISH from Desert Pond requires Bus Repair (42,500g Vault). Plan your gold income. Woodskip is Secret Woods only (need Steel Axe).
specialty-fish-bundle.strategyNote: Pufferfish (covered in Ocean), Sandfish (Desert), Woodskip (Secret Woods pond), Ghostfish (Mines floor 20-60).
specialty-fish-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Rush Bus Repair for Sandfish access. Get Steel Axe for Secret Woods ASAP. Ghostfish easy once in mines.
specialty-fish-bundle.commonMistake: Forgetting Sandfish needs Desert access. 42,500g is steep Year 1. Also Steel Axe needed for Secret Woods.
specialty-fish-bundle.rewardValue: 5 Dish o' The Sea gives +3 Fishing for 5.5 minutes each. Essential for legendary fish attempts. Save these!
specialty-fish-bundle.alternativeSource: Sandfish and Woodskip occasionally on Traveling Cart. Pufferfish extremely rare. Ghostfish uncommon.

crab-pot-bundle.proTip: Only need 5 of 10 items - pick the easiest! Crab Pots in ocean AND freshwater. Check pots DAILY or creatures despawn.
crab-pot-bundle.strategyNote: Ocean: Lobster, Crab, Shrimp, Oyster, Mussel. Freshwater: Crayfish, Snail, Periwinkle. Cockle from Beach foraging.
crab-pot-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Craft 3+ Crab Pots once Fishing Level 3. Place in ocean AND river. Clam from beach foraging. Easy 5/10 in first month.
crab-pot-bundle.commonMistake: Only placing ocean pots. Freshwater has exclusive catches (Snail, Crayfish, Periwinkle) you might need.
crab-pot-bundle.rewardValue: 3 Crab Pots save 4500g worth of resources. Place immediately for more catches. Luremaster profession makes them bait-free.
crab-pot-bundle.alternativeSource: Lobster and Crab appear on Traveling Cart. Freshwater catches too. But pots are easier.

spring-foraging-bundle.proTip: All items spawn naturally in Spring. Check Cindersap Forest, Mountain, Bus Stop daily. Wild Horseradish near farm.
spring-foraging-bundle.strategyNote: Leek (forest), Daffodil (everywhere), Dandelion (everywhere), Wild Horseradish (mountain/bus stop). All common Spring forage.
spring-foraging-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Complete this in first week easily. Just explore and pick everything. No planning needed.
spring-foraging-bundle.commonMistake: Selling forage items before completing bundle. Keep one of each until bundle done.
spring-foraging-bundle.rewardValue: 30 Spring Seeds grow Wild Horseradish, Leek, Daffodil, Dandelion. Each worth 20-80g. Good early Spring income.
spring-foraging-bundle.alternativeSource: These items are SO common, no alternative needed. Just explore.

summer-foraging-bundle.proTip: Sweet Pea spawns Railroad Area - unlocked Summer 3 from earthquake. Spice Berry in forest. Grape spawns everywhere late Summer.
summer-foraging-bundle.strategyNote: Grape (everywhere), Spice Berry (forest), Sweet Pea (railroad, mountains). All common but need to explore different areas.
summer-foraging-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Railroad opens Summer 3. Check it daily for Sweet Pea. Grape and Spice Berry while walking around.
summer-foraging-bundle.commonMistake: Not checking Railroad area. Sweet Pea is almost exclusively there. Opens Summer 3 Year 1.
summer-foraging-bundle.rewardValue: 30 Summer Seeds grow random summer forage. Each harvest 30-80g. Good passive income while farming.
summer-foraging-bundle.alternativeSource: All items appear on Traveling Cart occasionally. But foraging is free and easy.

fall-foraging-bundle.proTip: Common Mushroom and Chanterelle in Secret Woods daily. Hazelnut from bushes (shake them!). Wild Plum everywhere.
fall-foraging-bundle.strategyNote: Common Mushroom (Secret Woods, forest), Chanterelle (Secret Woods), Wild Plum (everywhere), Hazelnut (bushes).
fall-foraging-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Secret Woods access (Steel Axe by Summer) makes this trivial. Multiple spawns daily of mushrooms.
fall-foraging-bundle.commonMistake: Not shaking bushes for Hazelnut. They look like regular bushes but give forage. Also: need Axe upgrade for Secret Woods.
fall-foraging-bundle.rewardValue: 30 Fall Seeds grow Hazelnut, Chanterelle, etc. Each 50-160g. Plant immediately for extra Fall income.
fall-foraging-bundle.alternativeSource: Mushrooms appear on Traveling Cart. Hazelnuts from shaking forest bushes everywhere.

winter-foraging-bundle.proTip: Crystal Fruit and Snow Yam from artifact spots (worm tiles). Crocus spawns naturally. Winter Root from hoeing snow.
winter-foraging-bundle.strategyNote: Winter Root (hoe dirt/snow), Crystal Fruit (artifact spots), Crocus (foraging), Snow Yam (artifact spots).
winter-foraging-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Hoe EVERY artifact spot you see. Crystal Fruit and Snow Yam mainly from those. Crocus just walking around.
winter-foraging-bundle.commonMistake: Ignoring artifact spots in Winter. They give different loot than other seasons - forage items!
winter-foraging-bundle.rewardValue: 30 Winter Seeds = passive Winter crop! Each harvest 50-150g. ONLY way to farm in Winter normally.
winter-foraging-bundle.alternativeSource: All items on Traveling Cart. But hoeing artifact spots is reliable and free.

construction-bundle.proTip: Stone and Wood from farm/mines. Hardwood from Secret Woods (6 daily) or Mahogany Trees. 99 Fiber from weeds.
construction-bundle.strategyNote: Wood (99), Stone (99), Hardwood (10). Wood and Stone from normal play. Hardwood needs Secret Woods access.
construction-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Natural accumulation through farming. Hardwood: Secret Woods daily (Steel Axe) or Large Stumps on farm.
construction-bundle.commonMistake: Using all Hardwood before bundle. Save at least 10! Large Stump spawns on farm give Hardwood too.
construction-bundle.rewardValue: Charcoal Kiln turns 10 Wood into 1 Coal. Essential for smelting. Coal sells 150g. Good passive coal income.
construction-bundle.alternativeSource: Robin sells Stone 100g each if desperate. Hardwood is the only hard resource.

exotic-foraging-bundle.proTip: Coconut and Cactus Fruit from Desert (need Bus Repair). Cave Carrot from mines. Red Mushroom from mines/forest.
exotic-foraging-bundle.strategyNote: Need Desert access for Coconut and Cactus Fruit. Morel is Spring Secret Woods. Cave Carrot mines 10-20.
exotic-foraging-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Desert access (42,500g) is the bottleneck. Rush it if completing bundles is priority. Other items easy.
exotic-foraging-bundle.commonMistake: Delaying Desert access too long. Coconut/Cactus Fruit only there. Purple Mushroom rare - check Mines floor 81+.
exotic-foraging-bundle.rewardValue: 5 Autumn's Bounty food! +2 Defense +2 Foraging for 7 min each. Save for difficult foraging or combat.
exotic-foraging-bundle.alternativeSource: Coconut and Cactus Fruit on Traveling Cart occasionally. Red/Purple Mushroom too. Cave Carrot never.

blacksmiths-bundle.proTip: Copper/Iron/Gold Bars from smelting ore in Furnace. Build Furnace ASAP from Clint (unlocks at Mining 1 after finding copper ore).
blacksmiths-bundle.strategyNote: Each bar needs 5 ore + 1 coal. Copper: floors 2-39, Iron: 41-79, Gold: 81-119. Plan mining trips by floor.
blacksmiths-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Mine consistently. Copper by Spring, Iron by Summer, Gold by Fall. 1 bar each is trivial if you mine regularly.
blacksmiths-bundle.commonMistake: Waiting too long to build Furnace. Every ore without smelting is wasted time. Get Furnace immediately.
blacksmiths-bundle.rewardValue: Furnace saves building one yourself. Place it immediately and smelt constantly.
blacksmiths-bundle.alternativeSource: Bars occasionally on Traveling Cart (300-750g each). Or Clint breaks geodes that sometimes contain ore.

geologists-bundle.proTip: All from Geodes! Break geodes at Clint (25g each). Regular geodes floor 1-39, Frozen 41-79, Magma 81-119, Omni everywhere.
geologists-bundle.strategyNote: Quartz from mining/geodes. Earth Crystal from Geodes/Duggies. Frozen Tear from Frozen Geodes. Fire Quartz from Magma Geodes.
geologists-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Save ALL geodes, break at Clint. You'll naturally get these through normal mining progression.
geologists-bundle.commonMistake: Not breaking geodes regularly. They stack up and you miss bundle items. Break 10+ at a time when visiting Clint.
geologists-bundle.rewardValue: 5 Omni Geodes can contain ANYTHING - iridium ore, prismatic shard chance, artifacts. Very valuable.
geologists-bundle.alternativeSource: All items on Traveling Cart. Quartz and Earth Crystal very common. Frozen Tear/Fire Quartz less so.

adventurers-bundle.proTip: All monster drops! Slime (Green Slimes floor 1-39), Bat Wing (Bats floor 30-50), Solar Essence (Ghosts/Squid Kids 80+), Void Essence (Shadow monsters 80+).
adventurers-bundle.strategyNote: 99 Slime is lots of green slime kills. 10 Bat Wings easy. Solar/Void from deeper floors need combat preparation.
adventurers-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Farm early floors for Slime/Bat Wing. Deeper exploration Summer/Fall for Essence when you have better weapons.
adventurers-bundle.commonMistake: Underestimating 99 Slime requirement. That's 50+ slime kills. Also: Shadow monsters hit hard, bring food.
adventurers-bundle.rewardValue: Small Magnet Ring increases pickup radius. Stacks with other magnet effects. Helpful for mining.
adventurers-bundle.alternativeSource: Krobus sells Void Essence (Monday). Solar Essence rarer but occasionally on Traveling Cart.

chefs-bundle.proTip: Fiddlehead Fern is SECRET WOODS SUMMER ONLY. Very limited spawn window! Poppy needs seeds from Pierre or JojaMart.
chefs-bundle.strategyNote: Maki Roll (Queen of Sauce Y1), Fried Egg (starter recipe), Poppy (Summer flower), Fiddlehead Fern (Secret Woods Summer).
chefs-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Get to Secret Woods before Summer for Fiddlehead. Watch Queen of Sauce Summer 21 for Maki Roll recipe.
chefs-bundle.commonMistake: Missing Fiddlehead Fern! Only spawns Secret Woods in Summer. Miss it = wait entire year. High priority.
chefs-bundle.rewardValue: 3 Pink Cakes = universal liked gift. 250 energy each. Good for gifting and emergencies.
chefs-bundle.alternativeSource: Fiddlehead Fern on Traveling Cart is your ONLY backup. Check every Friday/Sunday in Summer.

dye-bundle.proTip: Red Mushroom from Mines floor 80+. Sea Urchin from Beach (Summer+ or Submarine ride). Sunflower needs seeds.
dye-bundle.strategyNote: Red Mushroom (mines/Secret Woods), Sea Urchin (beach, rare), Sunflower (Summer/Fall crop), Duck Feather (Ducks love you).
dye-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Sea Urchin hardest - rare beach spawn or Night Market submarine. Duck Feather needs Big Coop + happy ducks.
dye-bundle.commonMistake: Ignoring Sea Urchin. It's rare on beach. Night Market submarine (Winter 15-17) guarantees some.
dye-bundle.rewardValue: Seed Maker turns crops into seeds. Essential for ancient fruit, rare seeds. Huge money saver.
dye-bundle.alternativeSource: Sea Urchin on Traveling Cart. Duck Feather rare but appears. Red Mushroom common.

field-research-bundle.proTip: Nautilus Shell is Winter Beach ONLY or Rain Totems in any season. Purple Mushroom from Mines 81+ or Mushroom Cave.
field-research-bundle.strategyNote: Nautilus Shell (Winter beach), Chub (river, all seasons, easy), Frozen Geode (mines 41-79), Purple Mushroom (mines 81+).
field-research-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Choose Mushroom Cave at Demetrius event - guarantees Purple Mushroom. Otherwise mines 81+ searching.
field-research-bundle.commonMistake: Choosing Fruit Bat cave then struggling for Purple Mushroom. Mushroom Cave is MUCH better for bundles.
field-research-bundle.rewardValue: Recycling Machine turns trash into resources. Broken CDs become Refined Quartz. Soggy Newspaper becomes Cloth/Torch.
field-research-bundle.alternativeSource: Nautilus Shell and Purple Mushroom both appear on Traveling Cart. Prioritize if you chose Fruit Bats.

fodder-bundle.proTip: All VERY easy. Wheat grows in 4 days (Summer/Fall). Hay from Silos when cutting grass. Apple needs Fall fruit tree.
fodder-bundle.strategyNote: Wheat (4 day crop), Hay (from grass + Silo), Apple (fruit tree, Fall). Plant Apple tree Spring 1 Year 1!
fodder-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Apple tree must be planted by Spring 1 to fruit in Fall Year 1. Wheat and Hay trivial.
fodder-bundle.commonMistake: Forgetting to plant Apple tree early. 28 days to mature! Also: need Silo BEFORE cutting grass for Hay.
fodder-bundle.rewardValue: Heater keeps animals happy in Winter. Saves 1000g and improves Winter animal product quality.
fodder-bundle.alternativeSource: Apple on Traveling Cart occasionally. Hay from Marnie 50g each. Wheat trivial to grow.

enchanters-bundle.proTip: Wine from any fruit in Keg (7 days). Rabbit's Foot needs max hearts Rabbit. Pomegranate from Fall fruit tree.
enchanters-bundle.strategyNote: Oak Resin (tapper, 7 days), Wine (keg any fruit), Rabbit's Foot (lucky happy rabbit), Pomegranate (Fall tree fruit).
enchanters-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Plant Pomegranate tree Spring 1. Start tapping Oak trees immediately. Rabbit's Foot is Year 2 usually.
enchanters-bundle.commonMistake: Pomegranate tree delay. Must plant by Spring 1 Year 1 for Fall harvest. Rabbit's Foot requires Deluxe Coop + time.
enchanters-bundle.rewardValue: 5 Gold Bars = 2500g saved. Use immediately for tool upgrades or crafting.
enchanters-bundle.alternativeSource: Rabbit's Foot from Traveling Cart (rare!) or Serpent drops in Skull Cavern. Pomegranate from Cart too.

2500-bundle.proTip: Just gold. Farm, fish, mine, sell. This is the easiest bundle if you have income flowing.
2500-bundle.strategyNote: Focus on high-value crops (Strawberries, Blueberries, Cranberries) and process with Preserves Jar/Keg.
2500-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Save money from Day 1. Spring Strawberries (Egg Festival), Summer Blueberries, Fall Cranberries. Should hit 2500g quickly.
2500-bundle.commonMistake: Spending all gold on upgrades before completing Vault. Balance investments with bundle progress.
2500-bundle.rewardValue: Chocolate Cake is universal liked gift. 250 energy. Nice bonus but gold is the real reward.
2500-bundle.alternativeSource: No alternative - you need to earn gold. But 2500g is trivial by mid-Spring Year 1.

5000-bundle.proTip: Double the previous bundle. Continue farming staples. Process everything for higher value.
5000-bundle.strategyNote: Wine and Jelly sell for 3x raw value. Preserves Jar from Quality Crops bundle helps immensely.
5000-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Should have 5000g by Summer easily with consistent farming and selling. Mine for gems if farming is slow.
5000-bundle.commonMistake: Rushing this before other bundles that give useful rewards. Prioritize Preserves Jar first.
5000-bundle.rewardValue: 30 Quality Fertilizer helps Quality Crops bundle or future gold-star farming.
5000-bundle.alternativeSource: No alternative needed. 5000g is easy money.

10000-bundle.proTip: 10,000g is where it starts to require actual saving. Don't buy unnecessary buildings or tools until this is done.
10000-bundle.strategyNote: Fall Cranberries processed through Preserves Jar can fund this easily. Or Summer Starfruit if Desert unlocked.
10000-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Achievable by Fall Year 1 with good crop management. Cranberry harvest + processing = 10k+ easily.
10000-bundle.commonMistake: Buying Deluxe Barn (25,000g) before finishing Vault. Prioritize bundle completion for Bus Repair.
10000-bundle.rewardValue: 30 Bait is minimal. The real reward is progress toward Bus Repair (Desert access).
10000-bundle.alternativeSource: No alternative. But selling Ancient Fruit wine or Starfruit wine accelerates this significantly.

25000-bundle.proTip: This is the BIG one. 25,000g requires dedicated saving. Don't blow money on decorations or unnecessary upgrades.
25000-bundle.strategyNote: Ancient Fruit wine, Starfruit wine, or mass Pale Ale production. Fishing legendary fish helps too (5000g Legend!).
25000-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Tough but possible by Winter Year 1. Requires optimal crop selection and minimal spending.
25000-bundle.commonMistake: Spending 10,000g on Deluxe Coop when you're 15,000g from Bus Repair. Prioritize Desert access.
25000-bundle.rewardValue: BUS REPAIR! Desert access unlocks Sandfish (bundle), Starfruit seeds (huge profit), Skull Cavern (iridium), Casino, Sandy's shop.
25000-bundle.alternativeSource: No alternative. But this is 100% worth rushing. Desert access is game-changing.

missing-bundle.proTip: POST-GAME bundle! Only appears after Community Center completion. Requires rare items: Prismatic Shard, Dinosaur Egg, etc.
missing-bundle.strategyNote: Wine, Dinosaur Mayonnaise, Prismatic Shard, Caviar, Gold-quality Ancient Fruit. All end-game items.
missing-bundle.yearOneStrategy: Not possible Year 1. This is post-Community Center content. Focus on completing Community Center first.
missing-bundle.commonMistake: Worrying about this before finishing Community Center. It only unlocks AFTER full CC completion.
missing-bundle.rewardValue: MOVIE THEATER! Unlocks new social activities, special items, unique character events.
missing-bundle.alternativeSource: No alternatives. These are end-game items that require late-game content completion.

pantry.overview: The Pantry focuses on farming and animals. Completing it unlocks the GREENHOUSE - grow any crop year-round!
pantry.completionOrder: Spring → Summer → Fall → Quality Crops → Animal → Artisan. Plan fruit trees Day 1!
pantry.yearOneGuide: All except Artisan Bundle achievable Year 1. Artisan needs Pig (Truffle Oil) which typically means Year 2.
pantry.reward: GREENHOUSE unlocks growing crops in all seasons. Plant Ancient Fruit and forget about seasons forever.
pantry.priority: HIGH - Greenhouse is one of the best rewards in the game. Rush this room.

fish-tank.overview: Fishing bundles span all seasons and locations. Weather matters! Rainy days = Catfish/Walleye.
fish-tank.completionOrder: Crab Pot → Easy fish → Seasonal fish → Specialty (needs Desert). Check weather daily!
fish-tank.yearOneGuide: Possible Year 1 if you don't miss seasonal fish. Pufferfish (Summer sun) is the hardest window.
fish-tank.reward: Glittering Boulder removed - pan for ore in rivers. Plus 5 Dressed Spinners.
fish-tank.priority: MEDIUM - Panning is nice but not essential. Don't stress legendary fish.

crafts-room.overview: Foraging bundles follow seasons. Construction and Exotic need Desert access for completion.
crafts-room.completionOrder: Seasonal foraging → Construction → Exotic (needs Desert). Easy room overall.
crafts-room.yearOneGuide: All except Exotic achievable Year 1 without Desert. Rush 42,500g for full completion.
crafts-room.reward: BRIDGE TO QUARRY! Free high-quality ore and geodes daily. Big long-term value.
crafts-room.priority: MEDIUM-HIGH - Quarry provides consistent resources. Worth completing for passive income.

boiler-room.overview: Mining-focused bundles. All achievable through normal mining progression.
boiler-room.completionOrder: Blacksmith → Geologist → Adventurer. Just mine consistently and you'll complete naturally.
boiler-room.yearOneGuide: Easily done Year 1 Spring-Summer with regular mining. Slime (99) takes longest.
boiler-room.reward: MINECARTS REPAIRED! Fast travel between Beach, Mines, Bus Stop, Town. Huge time saver.
boiler-room.priority: HIGH - Minecarts are massive quality of life. Complete early for convenience.

bulletin-board.overview: Miscellaneous items from cooking, foraging, animals. Most varied requirements.
bulletin-board.completionOrder: Chef's → Fodder → Field Research → Dye → Enchanter's. Plan fruit trees!
bulletin-board.yearOneGuide: Possible Year 1 with fruit tree planning. Rabbit's Foot often delays to Year 2.
bulletin-board.reward: FRIENDSHIP BOOST! +2 hearts with all non-dated villagers. Saves months of gifting.
bulletin-board.priority: MEDIUM - Friendship boost is nice but not essential for gameplay.

vault.overview: Pure gold bundles. Total: 42,500g. Unlocks Desert access for Skull Cavern and more.
vault.yearOneGuide: Achievable by Fall-Winter Year 1 with good crop management. Prioritize income.
vault.reward: BUS REPAIRED! Desert access: Skull Cavern (iridium), Starfruit, Sandfish, Casino, Sandy.
vault.priority: HIGHEST - Desert access is game-changing. Rush this after essential bundles.
